text: A yi saraxaraline dɔxɔ kuru yɛɛn ma alo a fafe Dawuda a liga kii naxan yi, Lewi bɔnsɔnna xɛmɛne yi findixi bɛti baane nan na Ala xa e nun e wali saraxaraliin xa alo a yi daxa kii naxan yi lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ. Sulemani mɔn yi muxune ti Ala Batu Banxin dɛɛne kantandeni, a ito birin liga nɛn bayo Alaa muxun Dawuda bata yi a yamari na kiini.
